metadata.title: Army Universe MA-1 Bomber Flight Jacket Reversible Air Force Military Coat with Official Pin
features: Outer shell Is Made From 100% Nylon Material. Poly Fiberfill Lining Inside Jacket.
Jacket is cut for men, but can be worn by women as well.
Reversible Orange Lining. Slash Pockets on Both Sides with Button Closure.
Zippered Utility Pocket. Durable Brass Zipper.
Every jacket you order comes with our signature metal ARMY UNIVERSE brand pin.
description: MA-1 Bomber Flight Jacket Reversible Air Force Military Coat with Official Army Universe Pin - With our Military Air Force MA-1 Flight Jacket, you'll look like you belong at the helm of a F-16 jet. Our nylon flight jackets are designed to block wind from cutting through you. You can keep yourself warm in even the most bone chilling gusts of wind. The extra full cut in the chest allows the jackets to trap heat where you need it the most. These are made to the same military specifications to ensure the same high quality. They keep our air force warm in the frigid air of aircraft carriers and they can keep you protected in a harsh snow storm.
Every jacket you order comes with our signature metal ARMY UNIVERSE brand pin.

Made From 100% Nylon Outer Shell. Poly Fiberfill Lining Inside Jacket. Reversible Orange Lining. 4 Front Slash Pockets. Button Closure On Pockets. Zippered Utility Pocket. Features Extra Full Cut. Durable Brass Zipper. Air Force Bomber Style Jacket. Unisex.  Can this jacket be worn by women?
Yes. Many women purchase this jacket. It is cut for men, but can be worn by women.
Is this a fall or winter jacket?
This is a warm jacket that can even be used during the winter months.
Is this jacket cut true to size?
The jacket is known to be a little small, please check out our sizing below.

Size Chart XS chest size 29"-33" S chest size 33"-37" M chest size 37"-41" L chest size 41"-45" XL chest size 45"-49" 2X chest size 49"-53" 3X chest size 53"-57" 4X chest size 57"-61" 5X chest size 61"-65" 6X chest size 65"-69" 7X chest size 69"-73" 8X chest size 73"-77"
